inclusion.criterion: active symptomatic multiple myeloma without prior chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Stage I patients with at least 2 of the poor prognostic indicators may be eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Non-secretory multiple myeloma patients are eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients between the ages of 18 and 75 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female Patients of child bearing age (up to age 50) who are not pregnant and agree to use two adequate birth control methods during the study and at least six months after treatment unless patient has undergone hysterectomy or has been in menopause for 2 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients with Southwest Oncology Group (SWOG) performance status of 3 or better
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients who have received prior lower dose Dexamethasone Therapy (ie. 4 mg QID) as adjunct to radiation therapy for cord compression may be eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: All patients must have a MUGA scan indicating a left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) of greater than or equal to 50% within 42 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Must be able to understand English
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Must be willing and eligible to sign up for the STEPS program
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Nursing mothers or women who are pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of hypersensitivity reaction to doxorubicin or agents in Doxil®
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with previous malignancies at other sites except surgically treated nonmelanomatous skin cancers, prostate cancer or superficial cervical cancers, or other cancer from which the patient had been disease free for 5 or more years.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of mediastinal radiation for any reason
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with uncontrolled medical problems such as diabetes mellitus, cardiac, pulmonary, hepatic, and renal diseases unless renal insufficiency is felt to be secondary to multiple myeloma
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction within 6 months of enrollment in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major surgery within 4 weeks of enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
